content: Can you envision a detailed narrative for a mythical universe featuring an elusive underwater dominion that can only be entered through a mystical seashell? In addition, please provide a comprehensive JSON framework for the kingdom's configuration and population, taking into account the various functions and obligations of the king, queen, and other members of the ruling council. Furthermore, expound upon the seashell's one-of-a-kind characteristics and enchanting powers, as well as the method of acquiring and utilizing it to gain admittance to the kingdom.
